summary: A comprehensive test suite for the pregnancy supervisor component of a health simulation framework, containing unit tests that validate pregnancy-related processes such as abortion handling, twin pregnancy risk, gestational age calculation, antenatal care scheduling, labour induction, maternal complications (anaemia, gestational diabetes, hypertension, preeclampsia), preterm labour, birth outcomes, and integration with other simulation modules.
business_intent: To verify that the pregnancy modeling logic accurately reflects real-world maternal health outcomes, ensuring reliable simulation results for policy analysis, health burden estimation, and decision support in public health planning.
